title: Commercial Vehicle Group's Bostrom Seating Brand Introduces A New Premium Seat And Seat Options To Its All-Makes Seat Line-Up
text:
Commercial Vehicle Group, Inc.
- Wide Ride™ Core seat with optional 'Smart' memory switch feature available to order immediately
NEW ALBANY, Ohio , Aug. 27, Commercial Vehicle Group, Inc., (Nasdaq: CVGI) is proud to introduce a new premium seat to its Bostrom Seating brand's premium all-makes seat offering for class 7 and 8 heavy-duty trucks.
Available to order immediately, the new Wide Ride ™ Core seat built on our new generation Wide Ride II platform will deliver the benefits of a wider seat design with new features and options such as:
A 23-inch wide seat cushion, cushion extension and front and rear cushion tilt; A new optional 'Smart' seat memory switch that enables drivers to quickly exit the vehicle by deflating the seat and upon returning to the seat, inflating it; and A new color option, Saddle with Ultraleather ™ or genuine leather. Patrick Miller , President of CVG's Global Truck & Bus division said, "We are excited about the launch of Wide Ride™ Core. This new seat will extend our popular Wide Ride II product platform into additional vocational and regional applications."
The introduction of the Wide Ride ™ Core will complete a generational change in Bostrom Seating's premium seat line-up. More information will be available at http://www.bostromseating.com .
Ultraleather ™ , is a registered trademark of Ultrafabrics, LLC.
About Commercial Vehicle Group, Inc.:
Commercial Vehicle Group, Inc. is a Delaware (USA ) corporation. We were formed as a privately-held company in August 2000 . We became a publicly held company in 2004. The Company (and its subsidiaries) is a leading supplier of a full range of cab related products and systems for the global commercial vehicle market, including the medium-and heavy-duty truck market, the medium-and heavy-construction vehicle market, and the military, bus, agriculture, specialty transportation, mining, industrial equipment and off-road recreational markets. Information about the Company and its products is available on the internet at www.cvgrp.com .
